column2: "It's okay to do as I please, right, dear wife?" With his hot fingertips and sticky tongue... he teases my weak spots sweetly as I come again and again... This man whose thoughts I can't read turns into a "mean husband" only when he wants to tantalize me... "Please marry me." Fumika Momichi, who was leading a peaceful life working as the manager of a store, receives visit from a man who proposes to her with a bouquet of flowers in his hands. She soon finds out that her suitor is Masamune Isokawa, the heir of a large corporation. Confused by the marriage proposal of a childhood friend she doesn't remember, Fumika ends up having no choice other than marrying him after a certain event...!? Masamune's always smiling, elusive, and it's hard to understand his feelings. He tells her that getting married is one of the conditions for becoming the successor of his family. Despite that, he shows glimpses of attachment and twisted affection toward Fumika... How is her life going to be when she'll be at his mercy day and night!?Official English Translations:MangaPlaza, BookWalker, Coolmic

column2: 1) The love beyond taboo of a couple with a big age gap is as likely to bloom as a fruit out of season or a bird from an unhatched egg 2) A cake eater escapes next door, in a room of a high school student preparing for an exam. He tries to teach the "joy of life" to the student but is he really the teacher here ?3) Two office workers were on friendly terms when they entered their company, but now their rank is established and they are fighting like cats and dogs. The hero falls sick from drinking while entertaining customers...4) The hero who lives with his sister has to live with his old friend instead because she will get married. There is a sour past between the hero and his friend but his friend is willing to avoid the hero somehow...5) The name piece, Happy Ring. The hero tries to avenge his senior lover who is good at sex but no good at making a speach on his birthday 6) A young guy who is tired from an urban life is loved by a deaf-and-dumb rural boy and recovers his healthy state of mind.

column2: One stormy night, Erin swerves to avoid a dog in the road-only to end up crashing in the river. Struggling from the wreckage, she picks up the abandoned dog and wanders until she finds a clinic. The doctor, Dom, takes them both in; his warmth makes her chest so tight... The next day, out of nowhere, Erin offers to help Dom since he's so busy. Perhaps by his side, she can find meaning that can counter the listlessness she feels.(c)YOSHIKO HANATSU/MARION LENNOX

column2: Riku jumps off to reunite with Sachino in the afterlife, whom he had been in love with for a long time. When he wakes up, he finds a mysterious wizard standing there.The manga illustrated by zinbei, related to the album HappyEND by HoneyComeBear.Each chapter occurs with the song and music video of the same name, with 10 songs and 10 main chapters taking place over a period of 10 days, each music video releasing on the day of event from August 1st, 2021 (Sunday) to August 10th (Tuesday) telling the story of Riku and Sachino.

column2: I won't run away anymore. Even if I have to face against yakuza to whom money is everything. As long as it means I can get my sister back.After having her dream of working in academia ruined, Azusa now works as a teacher in the countryside and her days are spent putting up with the terrible treatment she receives from both her students and colleagues. One day, she came to learn that her younger sister Ruka, the only blood relative she has left, has gotten caught up in some trouble in Tokyo.What will Azusa do now that she's faced up against suspicious members of the underworld society? Here's the start of a hardboiled action series! Original Manga

You can't take your eyes off their frustrating relationship that will make you want to watch it forever!

column2: Office worker Shiho, age 28, plays the go-getter career woman so well that everyone at work calls her the "Iron Lady." Feeling uneasy about her relationship with her boyfriend Ken, Shiho takes the leap and invites him to a company party, but as the party begins he's still not there... In that moment, her handsome coworker, and heir to the company, Miyagi strikes up a conversation with her. Miyagi is a big hit among the female employees, but Shiho has always treated him casually, never taking much interest in his charms. However, when she runs into him again on the way to the bathroom, the usual sweet and chipper Miyagi is nowhere to be found! His speech is rougher, and he's dropped the workplace niceties, and on top of that he backs her up against the wall, blocking her retreat with his body...?! An office romance with a high-class bachelor, at once wicked and earnest, who just might be her Mr. Right!Official Translations:Korean (Bookcube, Lezhin)

column2: Tamaki's living the dream, getting ready to marry her coworker. But, as the day they tell her parents the happy news approaches, her snappy tone when she discusses what to wear and say on that day has dire consequences. Tamaki's husband―to―be breaks off the engagement...! Right as she's down in the dumps, her coworker Kei appears. Kei's the most popular and handsome guy at work, dubbed "The Prince" by the female employees. One thing leads to another, and Tamaki opens up to him about her shortcomings at a bar, then agrees to spend the night with him... She just wanted to feel someone's embrace for one night, but Kei comes up with an unexpected proposal!

column2: "You're being forced, but you still feel good. What a pervert." A new butler, Toudou, appears before a rich college student, Akito. Akito worked the previous butler hard. He's planning to use Toudou as he pleases too, but when he says something unreasonable, it doesn't work on him!
